author: Kim Hart
title: The coronavirus will reshape city life
description: The coronavirus pandemic will leave its mark on urban centers long after the outbreak itself recedes. Why it matters: The most densely populated cities are ground zero for the virus' rapid spread and highest death tolls — and they're also likely to be pioneer…
content:
